languageKey.label: Attributes for the type "Checkbox"
sav_library_kickstarter_all:*,sav_library_kickstarter_functions:*,sav_library_kickstarter_general:*
The string is used as a file name which is searched in the icon directory. It replaces the default image for a selected checkbox. Not available in "basic" type library.
The string is used as a file name which is searched in the icon directory. It replaces the default image for an unselected checkbox. Not available in "basic" type library.
If set, the check box is displayed as an image instead of a label (defaut=0 "basic" type library).
Do not display the checkbox value if it is not checked (obviously it does not apply when in edit mode).
